applogic

Class PlayingField

  • java.lang.Object
    • applogic.PlayingField

  • public class PlayingField
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the playing field used as a container for the individual cells that make up the playing field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayingField(int rows, int columns)
      Sets up the playing field.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewTetriminoToField(Tetrimino tetrimino)
      Method that adds a new Tetrimino piece to the playing field if it fits in, otherwise the game ends.
      void createCells(int rows, int columns)
      Creates the cells into the playing field.
      java.util.List<Cell> getAllCellsInPlayingField()
      Method for getting all the cells that make up the playing field.
      Cell getCell(int row, int column)
      Method for getting a specified cell in the playing field.
      int getColumns()
      Method for getting the number of columns in the playing field.
      Tetrimino getNextTetrimino()
      Gets the next Tetrimino that is going to appear in the playing field.
      int getRows()
      Method for getting the number of rows in the playing field.
      int getSTART_COLUMN()
      Gets the starting column where the tetrimino container appears.

      Gets the starting row where the tetrimino container appears.

      • PlayingField

        public PlayingField(int rows,
                    int columns)
        Sets up the playing field.
        Parameters:
        rows - how many rows there are to be in the playing field.
        columns - how many columns there are to be in the playing field.

    • Method Detail

      • createCells

        public void createCells(int rows,
                        int columns)
        Creates the cells into the playing field.
        Parameters:
        rows - number of rows that the playing field is going to have.
        columns - number of columns that the playing field is going to have.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Method for getting the number of rows in the playing field.
        Returns:
        number of rows in the field.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Method for getting the number of columns in the playing field.
        Returns:
        number of columns in the field.

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int row,
                    int column)
        Method for getting a specified cell in the playing field.
        Parameters:
        row - at which row the specific box resides.
        column - at which column the specific box resides.
        Returns:
        the box which resides at the corresponding coordinates.

      • getAllCellsInPlayingField

        public java.util.List<Cell> getAllCellsInPlayingField()
        Method for getting all the cells that make up the playing field.
        Returns:
        all cells in the playing field as an arraylist.

      • setNextTetrimino

        public void setNextTetrimino()
        Sets the next Tetrimino that is going to appear in the playing field.

      • getNextTetrimino

        public Tetrimino getNextTetrimino()
        Gets the next Tetrimino that is going to appear in the playing field.
        Returns:
        Tetrimino piece that is appearing next.

      • addNewTetriminoToField

        public void addNewTetriminoToField(Tetrimino tetrimino)
        Method that adds a new Tetrimino piece to the playing field if it fits in, otherwise the game ends.
        Parameters:
        tetrimino - piece that is going to be added next.

      • getSTART_ROW

        public int getSTART_ROW()
        Gets the starting row where the tetrimino container appears.
        Returns:
        int marking the row where the tetrimino container appears.

      • getSTART_COLUMN

        public int getSTART_COLUMN()
        Gets the starting column where the tetrimino container appears.
        Returns:
        int marking the column where the tetrimino container appears.
